description:
Leg lengthening surgery is an attempt to increase leg length due to aesthetic or health problems. Trauma, hormone disorders, leg inequalities, dwarfism and innate features can lead to not get taller. Lengthening operations can be performed not only for people with health problems but also for completely healthy.

Who can have leg lengthening surgery?

Lengthening surgery can be performed for people who think that they are short and who are medically determined to be short. It can also be performed for children older than 3 years old. By doing this surgery before the school age, the child is expected to be in the same height as his/her peers when s/he reaches his/her school age.

Lengthening surgery for adults 40 years and older is risky. The risk of complications increases in this age group. Therefore, aesthetic lengthening surgery is not recommended for this age group.

Lengthening surgery is not suitable for everyone. It cannot be performed for smokers, cancer, diabetic and heart failure patients. The bones and muscles should be suitable for surgery.

What should be the expectation?

When planning a leg lengthening surgery, the patient's body is considered as a whole. The surgery is performed by taking the joint decision of the patient and the physician considering the height, body and leg ratio. Increase in height is planned to be between 5-12cm.

Surgical process

Length extension surgery varies according to the devices used. 3 methods are widely used. The Ilizarov method has been used for many years. The other methods are Holyfix and combined methods. The decision of which method is to be used is determined by the patient's wishes and needs.

The surgery is performed by the orthopedic surgeon under general anesthesia. It takes 2-3 hours. The surgical procedure differs according to the method used.

The healing process

The patient is discharged after 2 to 7 days of hospitalization. There are no serious pain problems, so simple painkillers can easily control the pain. The surgical scar is minimal due to small incisions. The recovery time is different for each patient. Physical therapy support may be needed during this process to keep the joints of the patient flexible and to increase the strength of the muscles that support the healing process. After the necessary lengthening and bone strengthening is completed, the patient can walk and return to his daily life. The patient should follow the given instructions strictly in the post operative process to shorten the healing process.

description:
Erectile dysfunction is one of the most common sexual problems in men. Contrary to popular belief, this condition, which is frequently encountered with age, is caused by physical rather than psychological reasons. Although it is a common problem, only a small percentage of people who needs to get this treatment will actually recieve it. The shock wave therapy performed with the ED1000 device provides a very successful solution to this problem.

What causes a hardening problem?

The problem of erectile dysfunction is the inability to initiate or sustain the erection required for sexual intercourse. The main causes of erectile dysfunction are;

  • Heart diseases
  • Inadequate blood supply to the penis for hardening as a result of narrowing of the vessels coming to the penis
  • Arteriosclerosis
  • Diabetes
  • Nerve damage to the penis or pelvic region
  • Low testosterone levels
  • Neurological diseases such as Parkinson's
  • Side effects of drugs used in the treatment of various diseases
  • Aging

Shock Wave Therapy - ED1000

The use of shock wave therapy on the penis, which is used in the treatment of heart diseases, provided an important step in the solution of the erectile problem. Of course, the amount of energy given to the penis is less in shock wave therapy, which is also used in stone crushing treatment. 900 bar energy is used for stone crushing treatment and 100 bar energy is transferred for erectile dysfunction problem treatment.

The number of sessions depends on the condition of the patient. While 6-12 sessions are sufficient for mild and moderate group patients, 12-24 sessions are recommended for more severe cases.

ED1000 is a safe treatment. Drug use is not necessary and is not a surgical intervention. There are no known side effects. After the session, the patient can return to his daily life immediately. The patient does not feel any pain or discomfort after the session.

Taþ kýrma tedavisinde 900 barlýk enerji kullanýlýrken sertleþme sorunu tedavisinde 100 barlýk bir enerji aktarýlýr.

description:
In the nose there are some flesh called turbinate, which have a vascular network inside, which directs the inhaled air to the lung. The turbinates are arranged from bottom to top on the side walls of both nasal cavities. The task of turbans is to heat, humidify and filter the inhaled air.

Why do nasal flesh grow and what are the symptoms?

There are 3 turbines in each of the two nasal cavities. The largest and most working turbinate is the bottom one. It enlarges and shrinks depending on whether the breathing air is hot or cold. Allergic inhalation, air pollution, smoking, sinusitis, nasal inflammation and nasal bone curvature of allergy sufferers may cause the turbinates to grow larger than normal.

The most obvious symptom of nasal flesh growth is nasal congestion. Complaints such as open mouth sleep, snoring, difficulty in smell, pain in the face area and nasal discharge are also symptoms of nasal flesh growth.

Treatment of nasal flesh growth

Treatment methods such as medication and spray can be applied. These treatments are long lasting. The disadvantage of its long duration is that it can cause side effects such as dryness of the nose and bleeding. Surgical treatment is preferred when drug therapies are not sufficient.

Nose surgery (Nasal Concha)

The surgery is performed under local or general anesthesia. Reduction is applied to the flesh of the nose by radiofrequency or laser method. In radiofrequency technique, heat is given by electrodes placed in the growing nasal flesh. The heat given makes the nose flesh shrink. In the laser technique, the nose meat is minimized by irradiating the nose.

Recovery after nasal surgery is from 4 to 8 weeks. Activities that require physical force should be avoided for at least 4 weeks.

Burun içinde konka adý verilen, solunan havayý akciðere yönlendiren içinde damar aðý olan etler bulunur. Konkalar her iki burun boþluðunun yan duvarlarýnda aþaðýdan yukarýya doðru sýralanýr. Konkalarýn görevi solunan havayý ýsýtmak, nemlendirmek ve filtreden geçirmektir.

Burun eti neden büyür ve belirtileri nelerdir?

Ýki burun boþluðunda 3'er, toplamda 6 adet konka bulunur. En büyük ve en çok çalýþan konkalar en alttakilerdir. Solunan havanýn sýcak veya soðuk olmasýna göre büyür ve küçülür. Alerjisi olanlarýn alerjik madde solumasý, hava kirliliði, sigara kullanýmý, sinüzit, burun iltihaplarý ve burun kemik eðriliði gibi durumlar konkalarýn normalden fazla büyümesine yol açabilir.

Burun eti büyümesinin en bariz belirtisi burun týkanýklýðýdýr. Aðýz açýk uyuma, horlama, koku alma güçlüðü, yüz bölgesinde aðrý ve geniz akýntýsý gibi þikayetler de burun eti büyümesinin belirtilerindendir.

Burun eti büyümesinin tedavisi

Ýlaç ve sprey gibi tedavi yöntemleri uygulanabilir. Bu tedaviler uzun sürmektedir. Uzun sürmesinin dezavantajý burunda kuruma ve kanama gibi yan etkilere sebep olabilmesidir. Ýlaç tedavilerinin yeterli olmadýðý durumlarda cerrahi tedavi tercih edilir.

Burun eti ameliyatý

Ameliyat lokal yada genel anestezi altýnda yapýlýr. Radyofrekans ya da lazer yöntemi ile burun etine küçültme iþlemi uygulanýr. Radyofrekans tekniðinde, büyüyen burun etlerinin içine yerleþtirilen elektrotlar ile ýsý verilir. Verilen ýsý burun etinin küçülmesini saðlar. Lazer tekniðinde ise burnun içine ýþýn verilerek burun eti küçültülür.

Burun eti ameliyatýndan sonra iyileþmek için yaklaþýk 4 ile 8 haftalýk bir sürece ihtiyaç vardýr. En az 4 hafta boyunca çarpma riski olan ve fiziksel kuvvet gerektiren aktivitelerden uzak durulmalýdýr.

description:
Organ transplantation is the process of surgically removing an organ or tissue from one person (donor) and placing it in another person (recipient). Transplantation is performed when the organ of the recipient is unable to function due to illness or injury. Organ transplantation is one of the greatest developments in modern medicine. It requires a multidisciplinary study. With the advances in medicine, many organs can be transplanted today.

The person may allow the organs and tissues to be used for the patients in need after his / her life ended medically with his/her free will while alive. If he did not make a statement about this while he was alive, his organs and tissues could be donated by his relatives after his lifes ended medically. This process is an organ donation from the dead (cadaver) to living. The person can donate a kidney or part of his liver to a patient in need while he is alive. This process is organ donation from living to living.

Kidney transplantation

The kidney is an important organ for maintaining vital functions. Renal failure is a disease that reduces quality of life. It requires the patient to remain on dialysis on certain days. Renal transplantation is a better option than dialysis for advanced renal failure. A higher quality of life can be achieved by kidney transplantation despite the restrictive conditions of dialysis. Kidney transplantation can be performed from living to living and from cadaver to living.

Liver transplantation

In the case of chronic liver failure, liver transplantation is the only treatment. Living -to-living and cadaver-to-living transplantation can be performed. The liver is an organ that can be renewed and grow. In living-to-living transplantation, the liver of the recipient and donor returns to their normal state within 6-8 weeks.

Organ nakli, bir organý veya dokuyu bir kiþiden (donör) cerrahi olarak çýkarma ve baþka bir kiþiye (alýcý) yerleþtirme iþlemidir. Nakil iþlemi, alýcýnýn organýnýn hastalýk veya yaralanma nedeniyle iþlevini yerine getiremez duruma geldiðinde yapýlýr. Organ nakli, modern týptaki en büyük geliþmelerden biridir. Multidisipliner bir çalýþmayý gerektirir. Týpta yaþanan geliþmelerle birlikte, bugün birçok organýn nakli mümkündür.

Kiþi hayatta iken özgür iradesi ile týbben yaþamý sona erdikten sonra organ ve dokularýnýn ihtiyacý olan hastalar için kullanýlmasýna izin verebilir. Hayatta iken bu konuda bir beyanda bulunmamýþsa yine týbben yaþamý sona erdikten sonra yakýnlarý tarafýndan organ ve dokularý baðýþlanabilir. Bu iþlem ölüden (kadavra) canlýya organ baðýþýdýr. Kiþi hayatta iken kendi serbest iradesi ile bir böbreðini veya karaciðerinin bir kýsmýný ihtiyacý olan bir hasta için baðýþlayabilir. Bu iþlem de canlýdan canlýya organ baðýþýdýr.

Böbrek nakli

Böbrek hayati fonksiyonlarýn devam edebilmesi için önemli bir organdýr. Böbrek yetmezliði, yaþam kalitesini düþüren bir hastalýktýr. Hastanýn belirli günlerde diyalize baðlý kalmasýný gerektirir. Ýleri evredeki böbrek yetmezliði durumu için böbrek nakli diyalizden daha iyi bir seçenektir. Böbrek nakli ile diyalizin kýsýtlayýcý durumlarýna karþýn daha yüksek bir yaþam kalitesine ulaþýlabilir. Böbrek nakli canlýdan canlýya ve kadavradan canlýya yapýlabilir.

Karaciðer nakli

Kronik karaciðer yetmezliði durumunda, karaciðer nakli tek tedavidir. Canlýdan canlýya ve kadavradan canlýya nakil iþlemi yapýlabilmektedir. Karaciðer yenilenebilen ve büyüyebilen bir organdýr. Canlýdan canlýya yapýlan nakil iþlemlerinde, alýcý ve vericinin karaciðerleri 6-8 hafta içinde normal hallerine dönmektedir.

Akciðer nakli

KOAH, IPF, kistik fibrozis ve bað dokusu gibi hastalýklarda akciðer nakli uygulanabilir. Akciðer fonksiyonlarýný kaybeden hastalarda canlýdan veya kadavradan nakil gerçekleþtirilebilir.
